1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.1: The sons of Levi were Gerson, Caath, and Merari.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.2: The sons of Caath: Amram, Isaar, Hebron, and Oziel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.3: The children of Amram: Aaron, Moses, and Mary. The sons of Aaron: Nadab and Abiu, Eleazar and Ithamar.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.4: Eleazar beget Phinees, and Phinees beget Abisue,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.5: And Abisue beget Bocci, and Bocci begot Ozi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.6: Ozi beget Zaraias, and Zaraias beget Maraioth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.7: And Maraioth beget Amarias, and Amarias beget Achitob.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.8: Achitob beget Sadoc, and Sadoc begot Achimaas.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.9: Achimaas beget Azarias, Azarias begot Johanan,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.10: Johanan beget Azarias. This is he that executed the priestly office in the house which Solomon built in Jerusalem.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.11: And Azarias beget Amarias, and Amarias beget Achitob.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.12: And Achitob beget Sadoc, and Sadoc beget Sellum,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.13: Sellum beget Helcias, and Helcias beget Azarias,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.14: Azarias beget Saraias, and Saraias beget Josedec.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.15: Now Josedec went out, when the Lord carried away Juda, and Jerusalem, by the hands of Nabuchodonosor.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.16: So the sons of Levi were Gerson, Caath, and Merari.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.17: And these are the names of the sons of Gerson: Lobni and Semei.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.18: The sons of Caath: Amram, and Isaar, and Hebron, and Oziel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.19: The sons of Merari: Moholi and Musi. And these are the kindreds of Levi according to their families.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.20: Of Gerson: Lobni his son, Jahath his son, Zamma his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.21: Joah his son, Addo his son, Zara his son, Jethrai his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.22: The sons of Caath, Aminadab his son, Core his son, Asir his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.23: Elcana his son, Abiasaph his son, Asir his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.24: Thahath his son, Uriel his son, Ozias his son, Saul his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.25: The sons of Elcana: Amasai, and Achimoth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.26: And Elcana. The sons of Elcana: Sophai his son, Nahath his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.27: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elcana his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.28: The sons of Samuel: the firstborn Vasseni, and Abia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.29: And the sons of Merari, Moholi: Lobni his son, Semei his son, Oza his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.30: Sammaa his son, Haggia his son, Asaia his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.31: These are they, whom David set over the singing men of the house of the Lord, after that the ark was placed:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.32: And they ministered before the tabernacle of the testimony, with singing, until Solomon built the house of the Lord in Jerusalem, and they stood according to their order in the ministry.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.33: And these are they that stood with their sons, of the sons of Caath, Hemam a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Sammuel,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.34: The son of Elcana, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Thohu,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.35: The son of Suph, the son of Elcana, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.36: The son of Elcana, the son of Johel, the son of Azarias, the son of Sophonias,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.37: The son of Thahath, the son of Asir, the son or Abiasaph, the son of Core,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.38: The son of Isaar, the son of Caath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.39: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, Asaph the son of Barachias, the son of Samaa.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.40: The son of Michael, the son of Basaia, the son of Melchia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.41: The son of Athanai, the son of Zara, the son of Adaia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.42: The son of Ethan, the son of Zamma, the son of Semei.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.43: The son of Jeth, the son of Gerson, the son of Levi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.44: And the sons of Merari their brethren, on the left hand, Ethan the son of Cusi, the son of Abdi, the son of Meloch,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.45: The son of Hasabia, the son of Amasai, the son of Helcias,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.46: The son of Amasai, the son of Boni, the son of Somer,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.47: The son of Moholi, the son of Mud, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.48: Their brethren also the Levites, who were appointed for all the ministry of the tabernacle of the house of the Lord.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.49: But Aaron and his sons offered burnt offerings upon the altar of holocausts, and upon the altar of incense, for very work of the holy of holies: and to pray for Israel according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.50: And these are the sons of Aaron: Eleazar his son, Phinees his son, Abisue his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.51: Bocci his son, Ozi his son, Zarahia his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.52: Meraioth his son, Amarias his son, Achitob his son,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.53: Sadoc his son, Achimaas his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.54: And these are their dwelling places by the towns and confines, to wit, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Caathites: for they fell to them by lot.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.55: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Juda, and the suburbs thereof round about:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.56: But the fields of the city, and the villages to Caleb son of Jephone.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.57: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities for refuge Hebron, and Lobna, and the suburbs thereof,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.58: And Jether and Esthemo, with their suburbs, and Helon, and Dabir with their suburbs:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.59: Asan also, and Bethsames, with their suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.60: And out of the tribe of Benjamin: Gabee and its suburbs, Almath with its suburbs, Anathoth also with its suburbs: all their cities throughout their families were thirteen.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.61: And to the sons of Caath that remained of their kindred they gave out of the half tribe of Manasses ten cities in possession.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.62: And to the sons of Gerson by their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Aser, and out of the tribe of Nephtali, and out of the tribe of Manasses in Basan, thirteen cities.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.63: And to the sons of Merari by their families out of the tribe of Ruben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zabulon, they gave by lot twelve cities.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.64: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites the cities, and their suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.65: And they gave them by lot, out of the tribe of the sons of Juda, and out of the tribe of the sons of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the sons of Benjamin, these cities which they called by their names.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.66: And to them that were of the kindred of the sons of Caath, and the cities in their borders were of the tribe of Ephraim.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.67: And they gave the cities of refuge Sichem with its suburbs in mount Ephraim, and Gazer with its suburbs,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.68: Jecmaan also with its suburbs, and Beth-horon in like manner,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.69: Helon also with its suburbs, and Gethremmon in like manner,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.70: And out of the half tribe of Manasses, Aner and its suburbs, Baalam and its suburbs: to wit, to them that were left of the family of the sons of Caath.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.71: And to the sons of Gersom, out of the kindred of the half tribe of Manasses, Gaulon, in Basan, and its suburbs, and Astharoth with its suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.72: Out of the tribe of Issachar, Cedes and its suburbs, and Dabereth with its suburbs;
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.73: Ramoth also and its suburbs, and Anem with its suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.74: And out of the tribe of Aser: Masal with its suburbs, and Abdon in like manner;
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.75: Hucac also and its suburbs, and Rohol with its suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.76: And out of the tribe of Nephtali, Cedes in Galilee and its suburbs, Hamon with its suburbs, and Cariathaim, and its suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.77: And to the sons of Merari that remained: out of the tribe of Zabulon, Remmono and its suburbs, and Thabor with its suburbs.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.78: Beyond the Jordan also over against Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, out of the tribe of Ruben, Bosor in the wilderness with its suburbs, and Jassa with its suburbs;
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.79: Cademoth also and its suburbs, and Mephaath with its suburbs;
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.80: Moreover also out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Galaad and its suburbs, and Manaim with its suburbs;
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__06.81: Hesebon also with its suburbs, and Jazer with its suburbs.
